item.title: Counterpoint数据显示，中国1月智能手机销量同比下降23%
item.description: Counterpoint Research周四表示，受2025年基数较高及春节促销时间调整影响，中国智能手机1月销量同比下滑23%。【原文：China's smartphone sales fell 23% in January compared with a year ago due to a high base in 2025 and a shift in the timing of Chinese New Year promotions, Counterpoint Research said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英美烟草公司称美国禁售电子烟或使非法销售减少三分之一
item.description: 英美烟草公司首席执行官周四向路透社表示，美国可能采取行动禁止进口部分一次性电子烟，此举或将使蓬勃发展的非监管电子烟市场萎缩三分之一，不过相关影响预计不会在2027年前显现。【原文：A potential U.S. move to block imports of some disposable vapes could cut the booming market for unregulated e-cigarettes by as much as a third, British American Tobacco's CEO told Reuters on Thursday, though any impact is unlikely before 2027.】

item.title: 华尔街券商预测美联储将在2026年中期降息
item.description: 包括高盛和摩根士丹利在内的主要券商预计，美国联邦储备委员会将在6月实施下一次降息，而摩根大通则认为下次行动将是2027年的加息。【原文：Major brokerages, including Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley, expect the U.S. Federal Reserve to deliver its next interest-rate cut in June, while J.P. Morgan sees the next move as a hike in 2027.】

item.title: 人工智能云服务商Nebius因GPU和数据中心支出激增，资本支出大幅上升
item.description: 内比乌斯集团周四报告称，季度资本支出大幅攀升，主要受人工智能处理器采购和数据中心投资增长推动。这家人工智能云服务公司正加紧确保运算能力，以满足激增的市场需求。【原文：Nebius Group reported a sharp rise in quarterly capital spending on Thursday, driven by purchases of artificial intelligence processors and growing data center investments, as the AI cloud firm rushes to secure capacity to meet soaring demand.】

item.title: 斑马技术股价上涨，因2026年业绩展望乐观且宣布10亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: 斑马技术公司周四预测2026年销售额和利润将超出华尔街预期，其条码扫描仪和通信设备需求强劲是主要支撑因素，该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨近13%。【原文：Zebra Technologies forecast 2026 sales and profit above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, banking on robust demand for its barcode scanners and communication devices, sending shares of the company up nearly 13% before the bell.】

item.title: 美国当周初请失业金人数降幅低于预期
item.description: 上周美国首次申请失业救济人数降幅低于预期，这可能是因为冬季风暴造成的干扰仍在持续。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits decreased by less than expected last week, likely as disruptions from winter storms lingered.】

item.title: 富达加入提供抵押贷款支持证券ETF的公司行列
item.description: 富达投资将于周四推出两只主动管理型交易所交易基金，为投资者提供抵押贷款债务证券（CLO）的投资渠道。此举标志着越来越多的资产管理公司正试图满足私募信贷投资的需求。【原文：Fidelity Investments is rolling out two actively managed exchange-traded funds on Thursday offering investors access to collateralized loan obligations (CLOs), joining a growing roster of asset managers seeking to tap into demand for private credit investments.】

item.title: 美国长期国债收益率年内将走高；供应量将推迟美联储缩表进程
item.description: 路透社周四公布的调查显示，长期美国国债收益率短期内将保持稳定，但受通胀和美联储独立性担忧影响，今年晚些时候将出现上升；而短期收益率则因市场押注美联储降息而小幅走低。【原文：Long-dated U.S. Treasury yields will hold steady in the near term but rise later this year on inflation and Federal Reserve independence concerns, while short-dated yields edge down on Federal Reserve rate cut bets, a Reuters survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 联邦快递预计假日季度调整后利润将超华尔街预期，并设定2029财年目标
item.description: 全球快递巨头联邦快递周四表示，本季度经调整后的盈利将超过华尔街平均预期，并制定了截至2029年5月的财年增长目标。【原文：Global delivery firm FedEx said on Thursday adjusted earnings for the current quarter would top Wall Street's average estimate and set growth targets through its fiscal year ending in May 2029.】

item.title: CarMax任命前洲际酒店集团首席执行官基思·巴尔为首席执行官
item.description: 卡玛克斯公司周四宣布任命基思·巴尔为下一任首席执行官，他将接掌这家二手车零售商的领导权，带领公司实施转型计划并应对需求下滑的局面。【原文：CarMax on Thursday named Keith Barr as its next chief executive, who will take over the helm at the used-car retailer as it navigates a turnaround plan and lower demand.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，喷气发动机制造商CFM正为下一代节油设计研究备选方案
item.description: 据行业消息人士透露，在业界就节油与降低排放展开讨论之际，法美合资的CFM喷气发动机制造商正研究一种更传统的"先进导管式"发动机设计，同时推进其首选的未来喷气机革命性开放式风扇概念。【原文：French-US jet engine maker CFM is studying a more conventional "advanced ducted" engine design alongside its preferred option for a radical open-fan concept for future jets, as the industry debates fuel-savings and lower emissions, industry sources said.】

item.title: 埃克塞隆2026年前景看好，季度业绩超预期，得益于电价上涨与需求增长
item.description: 美国公用事业公司埃克塞隆周四预测全年调整后利润将大幅超出分析师预期，此前该公司第四季度盈利超出市场预期，主要得益于电价上涨和电力需求增长。【原文：U.S. utility Exelon on Thursday forecast full-year adjusted profit largely above analysts' expectations after beating fourth-quarter earnings estimates, driven by higher electricity rates and rising power demand.】

item.title: 公用事业公司PG&E因电力需求强劲上调2026年盈利预期
item.description: 公用事业公司PG&E周四上调了全年盈利预期，将预测区间的下限值提高，因其预计数据中心驱动的电力需求强劲，且整体负荷增长势头良好。【原文：Utility PG&E tightened its full-year profit forecast on Thursday, raising the lower end of its range as it sees strong power demand driven by data centers and broader load growth.】

item.title: 华尔街经纪商Clear Street将美国IPO估值目标下调至72亿美元
item.description: 华尔街经纪商Clear Street周四将其美国首次公开募股（IPO）的估值目标下调至72亿美元，较最初的118亿美元目标大幅缩水。【原文：Wall Street broker Clear Street on Thursday cut the valuation it is seeking from its U.S. initial public offering to $7.2 billion, a big haircut from the initial target of $11.8 billion.】

item.title: 伦敦金融交易所集团将打造区块链友好型数字结算平台
item.description: 伦敦金融交易所集团（LSEG）周四宣布，计划为机构投资者打造名为"LSEG数字证券存管库"的链上结算服务，该服务将连接传统证券市场与数字证券市场。【原文：LSEG said on Thursday it plans to build an on-chain settlement service for institutional investors called the LSEG Digital Securities Depository, which will connect traditional and digital securities markets.】

item.title: AEP扩大支出计划，电力需求激增推动其盈利超预期
item.description: 美国电力公司周四公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，并宣布将扩大其五年资本支出计划，总额将超过720亿美元，以满足激增的电力需求。【原文：American Electric Power surpassed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, and said it would expand its five-year capital expenditure plan beyond $72 billion to meet the surging demand for power.】

item.title: PBF能源公司炼油利润率回升，意外实现盈利
item.description: 炼油商PBF能源周四意外实现盈利，因俄乌战争引发的供应中断及原油价差扩大推高了炼油利润率。【原文：Refiner PBF Energy reported a surprise profit on Thursday, as supply disruptions tied to the Russia-Ukraine war and improved crude price differentials lifted refining margins.】

item.title: 百特2026年盈利预测低于预期，飓风影响拖累业绩
item.description: 巴克斯特周四预测全年利润低于华尔街预期，因飓风对关键生产设施造成的持续干扰影响运营，其股价在盘前交易中下跌13%。【原文：Baxter forecast annual profit below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as lingering hurricane-related disruptions at a key manufacturing facility weigh on operations, sending its shares down 13% before the bell.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称意大利税务警察搜查亚马逊，展开新一轮税务调查
item.description: 两名知情人士向路透社透露，意大利税务警察周四对亚马逊位于米兰的总部进行了搜查，这是针对这家美国科技巨头展开的新一轮逃税调查。【原文：Italian tax police carried out searches on Thursday at Amazon's headquarters in Milan in a new tax evasion investigation into the U.S. tech giant, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 铁山公司预测年度营收将超预期，得益于强劲的数据中心需求
item.description: 铁山公司周四预测2026财年营收将超出华尔街预期，因企业正加大土地租赁支出以建设数据中心，为人工智能工作负载提供支持。【原文：Iron Mountain forecast fiscal 2026 revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as enterprises ramp up spending on land leases to set up data centers powering artificial intelligence workloads.】

item.title: 总部位于阿姆斯特丹的人工智能公司Nebius将在法国里尔附近建造一座240兆瓦的数据中心。
item.description: 总部位于阿姆斯特丹的人工智能云服务公司Nebius周四宣布，计划在法国里尔附近的贝蒂讷建造一座240兆瓦的新数据中心。该项目建成后将成为欧洲规模最大的数据中心之一。【原文：Nebius , the Amsterdam-based AI cloud services firm, is planning a new 240-megawatt data centre in Béthune, France, near Lille, that will be one of Europe’s largest when it is finished, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: Anthropic将向支持人工智能监管的美国政治团体捐赠2000万美元
item.description: 据该公司周四发布的声明称，Anthropic将斥资2000万美元支持那些主张监管人工智能行业的美国政治候选人。【原文：Anthropic will spend $20 million to back U.S. political candidates who support regulating the AI industry, according to a company statement released on Thursday.】

item.title: 意大利铁路运营商Italo选择Starlink为列车提供卫星互联网服务
item.description: 意大利高速铁路运营商Italo周四宣布，将在其所有列车上引入SpaceX的Starlink系统，成为全球首家采用低轨道卫星通信服务的主要铁路公司。【原文：Italian high‑speed rail operator Italo said on Thursday it would introduce SpaceX's Starlink system across its fleet, becoming the world's first major train company to rely on the low‑Earth‑orbit satellite connectivity service.】

item.title: 早盘竞价：就业数据冲击利率押注
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 汉堡王母公司餐饮品牌集团第四季度销售额超预期
item.description: 餐厅品牌集团周四公布的第四季度同店销售额超出预期，得益于旗下汉堡王和蒂姆霍顿斯连锁店的客流量表现强劲。【原文：Restaurant Brands reported fourth-quarter comparable sales above estimates on Thursday, helped by resilient traffic at its Burger King and Tim Hortons chains.】

item.title: 庞巴迪第四季度营收因公务机交付量增加而上升
item.description: 庞巴迪周四公布第四季度营收增长，这家加拿大公务机制造商在2025年最后三个月交付了更多飞机。【原文：Bombardier on Thursday reported higher fourth-quarter revenue as the Canadian business jet maker delivered more planes during the last three months of 2025.】

item.title: 全球航运业坚持绿色投资，尽管碳价推迟
item.description: 航运业巨头正无视特朗普政府对全球碳定价的反对，继续推进数十亿美元的减排投资，多家公司高管及路透社数据分析显示。【原文：The shipping industry's biggest players are shrugging off Trump administration opposition to a global carbon price and are forging ahead with billions of dollars in emissions-reducing investments, according to company officials and a Reuters analysis of data.】

item.title: ARKO石油公司通过扩大规模的美国IPO融资2亿美元
item.description: 燃料分销商ARKO石油公司将其扩大的美国首次公开募股定价在预告区间下限，筹集资金近2亿美元。【原文：Fuel distributor ARKO Petroleum priced its upsized U.S. initial public offering at the low end of its indicated range, raising nearly $200 million.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯首席执行官：当前经营方针是"盈利性增长"
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰首席执行官奥拉·卡伦纽斯周四试图安抚投资者，消除他们对这家豪华车制造商可能放弃"价值优先于销量"战略的担忧，他表示公司现阶段的宗旨是"盈利性增长"。【原文：Mercedes-Benz CEO Ola Kaellenius sought to reassure investors on Thursday over a possible retreat from the premium carmaker's 'value over volume' strategy, saying that the company mantra was now "profitable growth".】

item.title: 独家：中国比亚迪与吉利竞购墨西哥汽车厂，谋求在墨西哥立足点
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国两大汽车制造商比亚迪和吉利已进入最终竞购名单，争夺日产-梅赛德斯-奔驰在墨西哥的工厂。随着美国关税导致该国工厂关闭和裁员潮，中国正寻求在墨西哥建立制造据点。【原文：Two of China's leading automakers, BYD and Geely, are among the finalists vying to purchase a Nissan–Mercedes-Benz plant in Mexico, according to a person familiar with the matter, as China seeks a manufacturing foothold in a country where U.S. tariffs are fueling factory closures and layoffs.】
